title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Fuck Ascension bring back DoomBots!
ikr
No Doom Bots {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

"Doom bots, vs players with the Urf buff, on crystal scar..."
NOW THATS SOMETHING ID TOTALLY PLAY!!!

Far out... I missed urf last time due to the crappy Telstra outage one my internet, and now I'm going to miss out again because I'm going on holiday on that weekend... I'm really hating this rotating game mode rioto, all I wanna play is urf and you make it the least chosen. You promised that you will make up for it for no April fools, but you are no where near it.
Don't think its riots fault for Telstra and your holiday plans...
feels ;-;
ive missed it every time because i havent been at the place where im able to play league at the time, but i will be there for URF all random!
Literally for the first time ever, next fortnightt i will get to play urf. every time its been available to play ive missed it. **BUT NOT THIS TIME!** {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
wHY DOES URF ALWAYS HAVE TO BE WHEN I'M AWAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY

Riot, hear my plea

Summoners Rift, URF buff, all random, with 2 ascension xeraths in the baorn and dragon pits, with nexus siege items, and bildgewater even items from last year, and perma ban ali yi zed yasuo and riven. THat is a gamemode i would play non-stop of.
Doom Bots should come back and replace ARAM as the permanent game mode! Every champion that ever existed should have a Doom Bot version of it!
why is one for all not showing up  for me{{item:3070}}
It starts at 11. Check now.
Shaco here i come one for all madness
Good luck trying to get him {{item:3070}}
lol
*Dubstep ignite* {{summoner:14}} https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FO7Re3mKNj4
URF I see you in my near-distant future~
